summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Hollow Knight: Silksong is out, and the hype is fucking insane.
• Online stores are getting wrecked—error messages everywhere, fans are losing their shit.
• Devs are scrambling to fix this mess while people wait to dive into the game.

Impact — The chaos around Silksong’s launch is proof that gaming demand can overwhelm even the biggest platforms.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.wired.com/story/hollow-knight-silksong-is-already-causing-online-gaming-stores-to-crash/
